Paulina 1st', 'fl avail September2022', 'This Stunning 6rms 2 bd rms 1800 sqft unit is in the heart of Edgewater close to the Grand vile train station, the lake and more.', 'Apartment has many updates with new bathroom and in unit w/d.', 'The kitchen was renovated last year.', 'Great outdoor space with beautiful tree line view on a quiet tree line street.', 'Great storage space, built in hutches, high ceilings, a lot of natural light throughout the unit and a quite building.', 'The entire unit has been freshly painted with neutral colors, this is a gorgeous unit with vintage meeting modern updates.', 'The combination of all these features makes this unit spectacular.', 'Available  September', 'Features', 'Large sunny rooms with high ceilings', '1800 sq ft 2bdrms and 6 rooms', '10 ft deck', 'Huge back yard', 'In unit w/d', 'Modern KT and Bthrm', 'Two large pantries', 'Bthrm has two entrances', 'Hardwood floors throughout', 'Ceiling fans', 'Window blinds', 'Chandler', 'Large front deck', 'Large private back deck w/ great view', 'Long Corridor separating the lvrm/dnrm', '2 bdrms with deep closets', 'Beautifully landscaped Backyard front of the building w/ lrg double yard', 'Pet friendly building', 'Ac units', 'includes heat, water, garbage and in unit w/d', 'Garage spot available', 'No Application Fee', 'Credit report required', 'No pet fees with signed pet rider', 'Pics and video is before the tenant moved in.', 'Texts preferred for a showing.', 'Please let me know a day and time that works for you', "and I'll try to accommodate your schedule.", 'https://youtu.be/2YUIadMYHyc', 'Please text for a viewing', '773.657.0725']
